attributes.action: require all Job Centres to vet employers whose jobs they advertise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The majority of casual labour and unskilled jobs advertised by Job Centres are actually for employers who flout health and safety, employment laws and who emply under such harsh and unreasonable conditions the employee is forced to leave within a very short timeframe. The Job Centre advertising these posts should be responsible for ensuring all employment and Health and Safety related laws are adhered to and followed as a contingency for advertising. In many cases, these same employers receive Government incentives for taking on the unprotected empoyees.
